name: React
description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on UI components. It is maintained by Meta and a community of individual developers and companies. React can be used as a base in the development of single-page or mobile applications

name: GraphQL
description: GraphQL is an open-source data query and manipulation language for APIs, and a runtime for fulfilling queries with existing data.

name: React-query
description: Fetch, cache and update data in your React and React Native applications all without touching any "global state".

name: Azure Active Directory
description: Azure Active Directory provides an identity platform with enhanced security, access management, scalability, and reliability.

name: .NET / .NET Core
description: NET Core is the latest version of Microsoftâ€™s .NET Framework( The framework is a re-usable design platform for software systems, which provides support for code libraries and various scripting languages ), which is a free, open-source, general-purpose programming platform. Itâ€™s a cross-platform framework that works with Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux.

name: Docker
description: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.

name: Kubernetes
description: Kubernetes is an open-source container orchestration system for automating software deployment, scaling, and management.

name: Azure Service Bus
description: Azure Service Bus is a fully managed enterprise message broker with message queues and publish-subscribe topics

name: Azure FrontDoor
description: Azure Front Door is an application delivery network (ADN) service that offers Layer 7 load-balancing capabilities for your applications.

name: Azure App Service
description: Azure Web Apps is a cloud computing based platform for hosting websites, created and operated by Microsoft. It is a platform as a service which allows publishing Web apps running on multiple frameworks and written in different programming languages

name: Azure Function Apps
description: Azure Functions (from Microsoft Azure) is a cloud-based serverless service that allows running event-triggered code in a scalable way without providing or managing infrastructure. It enables the capability to run a script or piece of code in response to a variety of events and doesn't need to run continuously.

name: Azure App Insights
description: Application Insights is a feature of Azure Monitor that provides extensible application performance management (APM) and monitoring for live web apps

name: SQL Azure
description: Fully Managed SQL Server databses. Used for Relational Data Stores

name: Azure Cosmos DB
description: Fully Managed NoSQL Databse. Used for Document Data Sroes.

name: Key Vault
description: Azure Key Vault is a cloud service for securely storing and accessing secrets.

name: Notebooks
description: Share behavior/code between individuals in isolcation allowing for commits into repositories without the need for a full application.

name: Octopus Deply
description: Automate Development workflows.

name: Database Migration Service
description: Automates the movement of data from on-prem databases into the cloud.

name: Text Analytics
description: Extract information from free-form text such as Sentiment, entities and language.

name: Xamarin iOS / Xamarin Android
description: Valorem has done work on these for MSFT XBox video & Channel 9 apps

name: Xamarin Forms
description: Valorem has worked on these before

name: Azure GCC / GCC High / DoD / Torus

name: Event-driven architecture
description: Kafka, RabbitMQ for queues

name: ELK
description: Elasticsearch is a search engine based on the Lucene library. It provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.

name: Dynatrace
description: Dynatrace is a software-intelligence monitoring platform that assists in driving performance results by providing development, operations, and business teams with a shared platform, metrics.

name: DataDog
description: Datadog is an observability service for cloud-scale applications, providing monitoring of servers, databases, tools, and services, through a SaaS-based data analytics platform

name: Splunk
description: Splunk Inc. is a software for searching, monitoring, and analyzing machine-generated data via a Web-style interface.
